Class GamePiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • GamePiece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Piece

    public abstract class GamePiece
extends java.lang.Object
implements Piece
    Is general piece with location, gameboard, and player string. Contains methods such as location, gameboard, and player methods. Contains abstract methods such as move, attack, health, and removal methods.
    Version:
    May 28, 2019
    Author:
    Ajeet, Matthew, Period: 4th, Assignment: APCSFinalProject, Sources: None
